name: D. Xor of 3
statement:
You are given a sequence a of length n consisting of 0s and 1s.You can
perform the following operation on this sequence: Pick an index i from 1
to n-2 (inclusive). Change all of a_{i}, a_{i+1}, a_{i+2} to a_{i}
oplus a_{i+1}
oplus a_{i+2} simultaneously, where
oplus denotes the bitwise XOR operation Find a sequence of n operations
that changes all elements of a to 0s or report that it’s impossible.We
can prove that if there exists a sequence of operations of any length
that changes all elements of a to 0s, then there is also such a sequence
of length not greater than n.
